sentence.Network_en: The auctioneer knocked the bureau down to a furniture dealer from York.
sentence.Network_cn: 拍卖者将写字台卖给从约克来的家具商.

sentence.Network_en: Benson signaled the auctioneer quietly and kicked the bid up another thousand dollars.
sentence.Network_cn: 本森悄悄地向拍卖人做了个手势,然后把出价又抬高了1000美元.

sentence.Network_en: An auctioneer, at the moment of non - sale, should be required to state plainly to his audience that an item has been bought in.
sentence.Network_cn: 遇到无销路时, 拍卖人必须向观众明确表示他已经买回自己送去的拍卖品.

entry.def: An auctioneer is a person in charge of an auction.

means.word_mean: 1. an agent who conducts an auction
